title: Food
creator_credit: G Gokhale and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: An animated film, without commentary, produced by a guest filmmaker from India, Gopal K. Gokhale, during a period of workstudy at the National Film Board. The film is intended to demonstrate to farm audiences in developing countries how improved farming practices and technology increase crop yield and income. Film without words.
